Description: Rim sherd of Chian Wild Goat Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed (fired brown) below; near bottom of sherd, faded added white and red bands; exterior: maeander pattern between bands of dotted blanks at rim; below, painted decoration consisting of undetermined motif (surface worn).
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0115) (phase 2)
